response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value, allowing you to experience the product's full potential at a discounted rate. I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
